Name: Virtual Studio
About the game: Live CGI's Virtual Studio is your one stop home broadcast studio! Look like a pro in a million dollar studio with nothing more than an HD webcam, greenscreen, and your streaming software of choice. Import your videos, images, and logos into your studio, and customize every aspect of the studio to match your brand aesthetic! Live CGI Virtual Studio lets you create the live studio of your dreams with these incredible features: Easy to use HUD interface to control every aspect of the studio Keyboard controlled AI Smart Camera and Studio Controls for live operation Import and control your videos and images via the three Studio Monitors Virtual Live Host via robust greenscreen keying, scaling, and location controls Customize every aspect of the studio's desk, walls, floor, supports, decorations, and trim Import your own wordmark and bug logos to complete your studio's branding
